robots.name: 2nd Try
robots.flavortext: 2nd Try is a googly-eyed horizontal spinner with a massive weapon - watch out!

robots.name: 80 Pc Rotary Fool Kit
robots.flavortext: A $6.99 knockoff Dremel from harbor freight shoved in an ant with a drill bit.

robots.name: Aardvark
robots.flavortext: Aardvark utilizes front-facing forks to control it's opponent.

robots.flavortext: Vertical Drisk

robots.name: AntMINE
robots.flavortext: AntMINE is the immovable object to your unstoppable force. It's sole purpose is cancelling kinetic weapons. Pray you can go the distance in the durability game.

robots.name: BlackBaron
robots.flavortext: BlackBaron is a TPU pusher bot

robots.name: Blastwave
robots.flavortext: Drum Spinner with four wheels.

robots.name: Blight
robots.flavortext: Blight is a 4WD vert. It features large titanium plows which provide ample front-end defense.

robots.name: BONK
robots.flavortext: this is BONK's first competition BONK's servo comes from an old robot dog and has over 10 replacements! so hit it hard! BONK 's Frame is printed using a PETG filament that has more durable properties than regular PETG BONK likes being scratched under the wheels

robots.name: Bowser's Fury
robots.flavortext: Bowser's Fury takes on a new meaning of terror as it spins and launches the competition across the arena!

robots.flavortext: A durable wedge bot that dances around the arena!

robots.flavortext: Utilizes a vertical spinner and a wedge. It looks to be based on the FingerTech Viper design.

robots.name: Fairy Powerful
robots.flavortext: A 4-wheel drive drisk with a Sylveon-inspired paint scheme. This is the bot I've wanted to build since I decided to build robots.

robots.flavortext: Jimmy Jazz is a beta edition of the new Scalar 1 lbs combat robot kit. Current record: 5 wins

robots.flavortext: Johhny Crash is a circular bot with a metal shell. It has fought in previous tournaments under the alias Supernova.

robots.flavortext: All of Night Sky Robotics bots have celestial themes to them Mars features a vertical drum spinner with hardened steel blades

robots.flavortext: Faster than a bullet. Terrifying scream. Enraged and full of anger. He is the Painkiller. This is the Painkiller.

robots.flavortext: Both RSL and MRCA has seen the beetleweight version of Specture perform quite well - having taken second place at the Minnesota Monster Mash and first place at the MRCA Finals in 2023.
